import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Discover the Wonders of History

From ancient artifacts to modern masterpieces, embark on a journey through time. Book your visit effortlessly with our intelligent chatbot.

Book Your Tickets
{/* Features Section */}

Why Visit Us?

World-Class Exhibits

Explore our vast collection of artifacts spanning millennia of human history.

Interactive Tours

Engage with history like never before with our guided and self-paced tours.

Effortless Booking

Use our 24/7 chatbot to book tickets in minutes, anytime, anywhere.
